titleNullable: Isekai Anime Light Novel Titles and Descriptions
subtitleNullable: 1300+ rows in isekai light novel titles and descriptions
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Inspired by Gigguk's [This Light Novel Does Not Exist](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=21zDl4sX3nE) video, I wanted to make my own isekai light novel title generating AI. I thought it would also be interesting to do it with the description/blurb or the novel too.

### Content

The data was collected from novelupdates.com, filtered by tags "Fantasy World" and "Alternate World". A python script using selenium and bs4 was used to scrape the data from the website. 

Since some titles are very short, it is recommended to filter them out for best results. 

The link is also provided if additional metadata is needed such as cover image, tags and recommendations. 

### Acknowledgements

Data collected from https://www.novelupdates.com/ by @andy8744 


### Inspiration

Try generate your own light novel titles or descriptions. Or how about both? 

Generate text with your LSTMs then try retraining GPT-2 to do the same. How does the results differ? 

Predict the genre based on the title and description. (multi-class classification)[This Light Novel Does Not Exist.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=21zDl4sX3nE)
